trans-unit.source: Running import and export procedures from JDBC

seg-source.mrk: Running import and export procedures from JDBC

target.mrk: Running import and export procedures from JDBC

trans-unit.source: You can run import and export procedures from a JDBC program.

seg-source.mrk: You can run import and export procedures from a JDBC program.

target.mrk: You can run import and export procedures from a JDBC program.

trans-unit.source: The following code fragment shows how you might call the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE</codeph> procedure from a Java program. In this example, the procedure exports the data in the <codeph>staff</codeph> table in the default schema to the <codeph>staff.dat</codeph> file. A percentage (<codeph>%</codeph>) character is used to specify the column delimiter.

seg-source.mrk: The following code fragment shows how you might call the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE</codeph> procedure from a Java program.
In this example, the procedure exports the data in the <codeph>staff</codeph> table in the default schema to the <codeph>staff.dat</codeph> file.
A percentage (<codeph>%</codeph>) character is used to specify the column delimiter.

target.mrk: The following code fragment shows how you might call the <codeph>SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE</codeph> procedure from a Java program.
In this example, the procedure exports the data in the <codeph>staff</codeph> table in the default schema to the <codeph>staff.dat</codeph> file.
A percentage (<codeph>%</codeph>) character is used to specify the column delimiter.

trans-unit.source: PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement( "CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE (?,?,?,?,?,?)"); ps.setString(1,null); ps.setString(2,"STAFF"); ps.setString(3,"staff.dat"); ps.setString(4,"%"); ps.setString(5,null); ps.setString(6,null); ps.execute();

seg-source.mrk: PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement( "CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE (?,?,?,?,?,?)"); ps.setString(1,null); ps.setString(2,"STAFF"); ps.setString(3,"staff.dat"); ps.setString(4,"%"); ps.setString(5,null); ps.setString(6,null); ps.execute();

target.mrk: PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement( "CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_EXPORT_TABLE (?,?,?,?,?,?)"); ps.setString(1,null); ps.setString(2,"STAFF"); ps.setString(3,"staff.dat"); ps.setString(4,"%"); ps.setString(5,null); ps.setString(6,null); ps.execute();
